title: Self Experiences.
body:
Recently, I just did my first game of promos, to secure the win, I waited for my duoq partner to help me get that extra advantage. However he decided to flame and afk in this game, so now that im going 0-1 in my promos and my duoq partner does not exist anymore, I'm asking you guys in a very ***serious*** tone. "What can I do to improve and climb out of bronze?"

Extra information; In my Promos 0-1, Lee Sin Jungler, currently Bronze 4. 43.8% win ratio with all champs, 60% win ratio with Lee Sin.
Preferred roles (In order); Jungle, Mid, ADC, Top, Support.

replies.body: Add me i'll give ya some tips if you are on when I am on :)

Hey man I got this you can look at:

http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=60990

It's a guide I made on how to escape bronze. But I can some it up:

1. Get good at farming
2. Ward your own lane 
3. Know your role - In the guide
4. Know your champion and how to play that champion
5. Don't flame

Steps to get out of bronze
Step 1:Stop posting about it here and go play the game until you make it out (And also I guess don't duo with douche bags)
Can't really do that without actually **Knowing** what to do to get out of bronze, and also, why don't you go get of bronze too?

> [{quoted}](name=vQwaKe,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=vvg0mG0y,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-06T11:18:39.400+0000)
>
> Can't really do that without actually **Knowing** what to do to get out of bronze

There isn't any particular thing that will magically make you silver anything. What you need to do to get out should be common sense so I won't bother explaining it.

> [{quoted}](name=vQwaKe,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=vvg0mG0y,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-06T11:18:39.400+0000)
>
>why don't you go get of bronze too?

Planning to but I myself want to wait a month or so to start playing seriously, I got off to a good start though.

> [{quoted}](name=vQwaKe,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=vvg0mG0y,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-06T11:32:06.259+0000)
>
> I was silver last year ;)

Then this thread is redundant you have been there and thus should know how to get there.
new year new meta; vayne sux now
